pr_title: Move memtable plan index from ChunkGroupFooter to a separate marker

timeline.message: move plan index from chunk group footer to a separate marker

timeline.bodyText:
Actually in the new tsfile,  we use number 4 as another type of chunk_header.
https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/IOTDB/New+TsFile+Format
What about change this to 5, or change the new chunk_header marker to 5?
timeline.author: HTHou
